name: Island Quest
description:
Game in German only (so far)!

A Super Mega Mini RPG made with RPGMaker VX Ace for the 1-Map Contest at the RPG-Atelier, the German RPGMaker Community: https://www.rpg-atelier.de/

You're stranded on a mythical (cursed?) island and now it's up to you to figure out what exactly is going on as you explore the island and level up!

All the action happens on one map as per the rules of the contest. Features lots of random battle encounters and a Game Over like Dragon Quest where you're directly back in the game with all you EXP and only lose 50% of your Gold. So no hard feelings!

It takes about an hour to beat. Playable without VX Ace RTP.

Music by Bert J. Hernández, you can check out the O.S.T. here:

SOUNDCLOUD

Thanks to Ben for hosting the contest and my beta testers TheDude and 'Ich bin viele' aka Legion!
